#version 330

in vec3 in_Position;
in vec2 in_Texcoord;
in vec3 in_Normal;

out vec2 ex_Texcoord;
out vec3 ex_Normal;
out vec3 ex_FragPos;

uniform mat4 trans;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 proj;
uniform vec3 lightPos;

void main()
{
	ex_Texcoord = in_Texcoord;
	gl_Position = proj * view * trans * vec4(in_Position, 1.0);

	ex_Normal = in_Normal;
	ex_FragPos = vec3(trans * vec4(in_Position, 1.0f));
}
